entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High 8. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023
